page.title: 05A Christmas Visit
page.content: Last Christmas a group of children from our school went Carol singing to Lydiafield and Langshaw,old peoples homes.We went to Langshaw on Monday and went to Lydiafield on Wednesday.We got some Ginger Wine and a biscuit at Langshaw. When we got into the house an old women aged about eighty rang a bell for the people to take her tea up.They enjoyed our visit very much. When we got back to school we just went straight home.A few days later we got a card from the old people at Langshaw. BY LESLEY NICKSON
